name: Amethyst Crystal Tree
des: Promotes calmness, mental clarity, and spiritual growth. Helps create a peaceful and balanced environment.

name: Carnelian Crystal Tree
des: Energizes creativity, motivation, and inner strength. Supports confidence and positive life energy.

name: Clear Quartz Crystal Tree
des: Known as the master healer for energy amplification. Enhances clarity, focus, and overall harmony.

name: Lapis Lazuli Crystal Tree
des: Encourages wisdom, truth, and emotional balance. Supports communication and inner awareness.

name: Seven Chakra Crystal Tree
des: Balances and aligns all seven energy centers. Promotes harmony, positivity, and holistic well-being.

name: Money Crystal Tree
des: Attracts abundance, prosperity, and financial growth. Enhances positive energy for success and stability.

name: Red Jasper Crystal Tree
des: Provides grounding, strength, and emotional stability. Supports courage, endurance, and protective energy.

name: Rose Crystal Tree
des: Radiates love, compassion, and emotional healing. Creates a soothing and harmonious atmosphere.
